system.app: Copy nerve signals used in your last action so it can be repeated even if incapacitated.
system.notes: S: Redo the user's last action on the turn after their death; make a roll if necessary. T: The last action never stops happening until the corpse falls apart; next clone starts with -50 XP Points.

system.app: Fills the brain with sights, sounds and smells that reduce stress.
system.notes: S: Cancel losing up to 3 Moxie from a stressful event. T: So happy that nothing aggressive can be done; will happily get beat up rather than fight.

system.app: Intercept data packets from a target's Coretech signal before they act.
system.notes: S: Pick a human character and go one clearance before them this round. T: Overwhelmed by packets; go dead last this round.

system.app: Idiot-proof video editing software for Coretech recordings.
system.notes: S: +1 success when editing video evidence or using it to back accusations. T: Deleted the good parts; +1 Treason Star.

system.app: Triples range and sensitivity of sensory signals to Coretechs.
system.notes: S: +2 successes for using any of the five senses to gather intel. T: Overstimulation; -2 Moxie.
